snippet.title: Haunted Lands: Burial Grounds trailer
snippet.description:
Dark and bloody retro inspired action platformer. Slay the grim cultists, the infernal minions and twisted nightmarish creatures that roam the Haunted Lands.

In this release:
- 4 playable characters, 
- huge Burial Ground mission with dozens of regular monsters, elite enemies and bosses,
- artifact system to improve characters offence and defense.
Get it for free: 
https://alevgor.itch.io/haunted-lands-burial-grounds
